document_data.mainbody:
arth was a caravan guard in the midâ€“14 century DR.
He was a guard for Orthil Voldovans caravan and often worked on tasks together with Sarlor and Mulgar.
Tarth was a guard for Orthil Voldovans caravan in the , when it was joined by Shandril Shessair and Narm Tamaraith. During the ride from Scornubel to Triel, he was briefly assigned to helping Mulgar quiet a horse somehow or else kill it. He was also assigned briefly to keep watch on Shandril, where he helped quiet Sarlor, a fellow guard, after the latters outburst at Shandril.
